survey
code {%trans "Survey..."%}
{%trans "Optional"%} {"survey": "3r"}

publish {%trans "Select the status of poll between draft and publish"%}
{%trans "Mandatory"%} {"status": "publish"}
language
fa Set the language of your choice
{%trans "Optional"%} {"language": "en"}
summary
string {%trans "Write the summary of your poll"%}
{%trans "Optional"%} {"summary": "The weather is an important factor for travelers of your city."}
description
string {%trans "Describe your poll"%}
{%trans "Optional"%} {"description": "please selectan option that describes the weather in your city."}
file
url {%trans "Upload a file like an image that shows the weather in your city."%}
{%trans "Optional"%} {"file": "../images/winter.png"}
tree
object {%trans "The tree of the question specifies the parent and answers connected to the poll"%}
{%trans "Optional"%} {%trans "Go to table"%}
branding
object {%trans "If the poll is being created by a brand or company, they can fill in the required information to show their brand identity."%}
{%trans "Optional"%} {%trans "Go to table"%}
answers
array of objects {%trans "The answer to the poll or question is specified by this variable"%}
{%trans "Mandatory"%} {%trans "Go to table"%}
options
object {%trans "Set different options for your poll"%}
{%trans "optional"%} {%trans "Go to table"%}
hidden_result
BOOL {%trans "whether to hide the results from public or not is set by this variable "%}
{%trans "Optional"%} {"hidden_result": "true"}
schedule
object {%trans "Schedule a poll to be published at a certain time and date in the future"%}
{%trans "optional"%} {%trans "Go to table"%}
article
array {%trans "Select an article to connect it to your poll or question"%}
{%trans "Mandatory"%} {"article": []}
tags
array {%trans "select the tags of the question"%}
{%trans "Mandatory"%} {"tags": []}
cats
code {%trans "Set the category of the poll or question."%}
{%trans "Mandatory"%} {"cats": "x46"}
from
object {%trans "Select the target audience of the poll"%}
{%trans "optional"%} {%trans "Go to table"%}

{%trans "Poll From"%}

{%trans "ID"%}
{%trans "Variable"%} {%trans "Description"%}
{%trans "Priority"%} {%trans "Example"%}
count
int {%trans "From how many person the poll should be asked."%}
{%trans "Optional"%} {"count": "3500"}
gender
array {%trans "Select the gender that can answer the poll. It can be "%} male | female | null
{%trans "Optional"%} {"gender": ["male"]}
marrital
array {%trans "Set the marrital status of the people who can answer the poll"%}
["single", "married", "null"]
{%trans "Optional"%} {"marrital": ["single"]}
graduation
array {%trans "Set the graduation status of the people who can answer the poll"%}
["illiterate", "undergraduate", "graduate"]
{%trans "Optional"%} {"graduation": ["graduate"]}
degree
array {%trans "Set the university or college degree status of the people who can answer the poll"%}
["under_diploma", "diploma", "2_year_college", "bachelor", "master", "phd"]
{%trans "Optional"%} {"degree": ["master"]}
range
array {%trans "Set the age range of the people who can answer the poll"%}
["-13", "diploma", "14-17", "18-24", "25-30", "31-44", "45-59", "60+"]
{%trans "Optional"%} {"range": ["18-24"]}
employmentstatus
array {%trans "Set the job status of the people who can answer the poll"%}
["employee", "unemployed", "retired"]
{%trans "Optional"%} {"employmentstatus": ["unemployed"]}
housestatus
array {%trans "Set the housing status of the people who can answer the poll"%}
["owner", "tenant", "homeless"]
{%trans "Optional"%} {"housestatus": ["tenant"]}
